assets.description: File paths to be copied from the project root to the output path.

additionalTargets.description: Additional targets to run after the build is completed.

outputPath.description: Destination folder for the build output.

outputFile.description: Path to the bundled output file, relative to `outputPath`. This should match the `main` field of your `package.json`.

package.description: Package the extension with `vsce` after building.

install.description: Install the local `.vsix` file after building. Implies `package=true`.
